00022 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00023 #include "algorithm/selector/ProbeSelector.h"
00024 //
00025 
00026 // this is a toy program to exercise covariate normalization
00027 
00028 void executeSelect()
00029 {
00030         cout << "running executeSelect()...\n";
00031 
00032         int i;
00033 
00034         vector<double> Output;
00035         vector<int> Input;
00036         vector< vector<double> > Covar;
00037         vector<double> Sums;
00038         vector<double> PriorM;
00039         vector<double> PriorW;
00040         PriorM.resize(3);
00041         PriorW.resize(3);
00042         PriorM[0] = 0.66;
00043         PriorM[1] = 0;
00044         PriorM[2] = -0.66;
00045         PriorW[0]=PriorW[1]=PriorW[2] = 0.5;
00046 
00047         Input.resize(100);
00048         Covar.resize(1);
00049         Covar[0].resize(100);
00050         for (i=0; i<33; i++)
00051         {
00052                 Input[i] = 0;
00053                 Covar[0][i] = -.5+i/1000.0;
00054         }
00055         for (;i<66; i++)
00056         {
00057                 Input[i] = 1;
00058                 Covar[0][i] = 0+i/1000.0;
00059         }
00060         for (;i<100; i++)
00061         {
00062                 Input[i] = 2;
00063                 Covar[0][i]=.5+i/1000.0;
00064         }
00065         
00066         LogisticRegression(Sums,Output,Input,Covar,PriorM,PriorW,100,.0001);
00067         for (i=0; i<Output.size(); i++)
00068                 cout << Output[i] << endl;
00069   
00070   //
00071   cout << "done.\n";
00072 }
00073 
00074 int main( int argc, char *argv[])
00075 {
00076         executeSelect();
00077 }
